comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 8.0; Windows NT 5.1; Trident/4.0; .NET CLR 2.0.50727; .NET CLR 3.0.4506.2152; .NET CLR 3.5.30729; IE0006_ver1;EN_US)
Build Identifier: Firefox 4.0

Proxy comes attached with firefox 4.0 when opened .exe removed from apps in computer I had to use malware, and a disc cleaner.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Download firefox
2.Open firefox.
3.{You don't suck.} "exe" removed from all apps

Actual Results:  
"exe" removed from all apps and shut down all internet access

Expected Results:  
Cursed and took to my computer geeks house. Said I was fourth he had to fix in last couple of weeks Took him 1/2 to fix.

Worked without an execution command..)

comments.raw_text: Where did you download Firefox from? Did the geeksquad guy say what malware actually caused the problem?
